I have stood on some of the Earth's oldest rock formations and witnessed grooves and trenches cut in this basalt, some 15,000 years prior by ICE that was more than 1 mile thick.
The same area features 2.5 billion year old fossil Stromatolites.

HOW, WITHOUT HUMAN ACTIVITY DID THE AREA IN QUESTION GO FROM VULCANISM TO TROPICAL OCEAN TO ICE WORLD AND THEN A CONIFEROUS FORREST?
mentally handicapped mind enslaved christians, go back on reading your shitty bible

More radiation = more heat = higher temperature
Who's too stupid to understand this?
Maybe trolls are (2stupid) ;-)

Oh you evil deniers.  Don't you know denying global warming science fiction is racist?  

Global warming science fiction is settled science fiction.  

To deny it is the equivalent of saying Star Trek and Star Wars isn't real.

I really don't think that many of you understand the underlying science.

Been on a scientific survey or ever done research?

Do you know what "Holocene" means?

How about the term "glacial minimum"?

Climate change is constant, if it were not, Canada would still be a sunny tropical ocean.
